page.title: 13Scouting in Grampound
page.content: You have to be eleven years old to be a scout.The Grampound troop has its head quarters in the village.It has raised a lot of money to repair headquarters.Some of the boys parents are on the committee which helps to raise money for all sorts of things.The scouts meet on wednesdays but not during the school holidays.Every year they go on camp in the school holidays.They go for a week to a different place every year.Every boy belongs to a patrol which is in charge of a patrol leader.The boys learn how to do lots of things like make bridges and canoes. They go swimming and go on night hikes.They work for badges and learn how to do first aid.Most of the Scouts have been in the cubs before they go in the Scouts.Their uniform is grey trousers green shirt and green beret.
